Game.Name: Fire Pro Wrestling 2 (USA)
Game.plot: In this second version of the Fire Pro series in the GBA over 200 wrestlers are available, with the usual CAW mode allowing to increase that number by 77. Along the Practice Dojo and the Exhibition match, the main mode is the Ironman road, where the initial roster of 10 wrestlers (11 once you finish training mode) is expanded as you beat your opponents one by one. Both Exhibition and Ironman Road feature match kinds such as Gruesome and Deathmatch (inside a electrified cage) with all assorted rule changes included. There's also the ability to play in a four-man Battle Royal.The CAW mode, one of the selling points of the original SNES titles, is as good as ever, allowing to create Wrestlers from scratch, personalizing them from how they look to how they fight, as well as trading them between federations.Cheat: All Wrestlers UnlockedAlright, just go into CAW. Put this in as the name of the CAW: Nick Name: ALL Last Name (On the Left): WRESTLER First Name (On Right): CLEAR Exchange: Off Middle: Leave Blank Then, save the CAW. After that, all wrestlers in the game should be unlocked. After saving, you can then overwrite the CAW with another CAW if you wish and still have all the wrestlers unlocked.Cheat: All Wrestlers UnlockedTo unlock every wrestler in the Japanese version of Fire Pro 2, go to wrestler edit, and name entry, and put in the following information in katakana: NICKNAME: ki chi ji (small)yo u ji SHORT NAME: ka ra LONG NAME: a za bu ji (small)yu u ba n Hit start, and it will change the name of the wrestler and play a fanfare. Make a new MoR game and save; voila, you have every hidden wrestler in the game.Cheat: Ironman Road - SpecialTo unlock the Special difficulty in Ironman Road, complete the Easy, Normal, and Hard difficulties in Ironman Road.Cheat: Ironman Road - SpecialIn manager of the ring mode pick WCW as your federation then sometime in your second year if your fed rank #1 you will unlock Rick Flair and he will be holding the Showman title.Cheat: Ironman Road - SpecialJust finish every step in training mode and you will unlock the trainerCheat: Ironman Road - SpecialTo unlock the following federations in MOR mode, you must place first at the end of the game. Your federation's primary style at the end will decide which you unlock. Strong Style - New Japan Pro Wrestling Kings' Road - All Japan Pro Wrestling Stoic Style - Pride FC Showman Style - World Wrestling Entertainment Lucha Style - Triple A Hardcore Style - None Freestyle - None Your federation's primary style can change if you use a different style often enough.Cheat: Ironman Road - SpecialTo unlock wrestlers for the US version, defeat them in their respective Ironman Road difficulties and complete the training mode to unlock the only non-Ironman Road wrestler.Cheat: Old Code MessageGo to the Edit Mode's Edit Wrestler Name Entry screen and enter the following: Nickname: ALL Short Name: STYLE Long Name: CLEAR Exchange: OFF Middle: [] Then press start to go back to the Edit Wrestler screen and the name should now read: Noooo! It's Old CommandCheat: Unlock D-Von and Bubba Ray DudleyIn Manager of The Ring mode go to talent search and serch for Any for the style and for region pick AmericaCheat: Unlock D-Von and Bubba Ray DudleyIn manager of the ring mode, go to ''Talent Search''. Choose ''Strong'' for the fighting style and ''America'' for the region.Cheat: Unlock D-Von and Bubba Ray DudleyUnlock Dynamite Kid In manager of the ring mode, go to ''Talent Search''. Choose ''Lucha'' for the fighting style and ''Japan'' for the region.Cheat: Unlock D-Von and Bubba Ray DudleyPlay Manager Of The Ring for five years with Toryumon and if you are rank 1 overall sometime in your fifth year you will see a nurse screen and then when you look in your roster Ultimo Dragon will then be unlockCheat: Unlock D-Von and Bubba Ray DudleyIn Manager of The Ring mode go to talanet search and then pick Any as the fighting style and pick Europe for the region
Game.Notes: Fire Pro Wrestling 2 features detailed action and more than 200 wrestlers from which to choose, as well as the ability to create and store wrestlers of your own. It also allows you to connect up to four Game Boy Advances and take on, team up, or trade wrestlers. You can customize every detail of a wrestler's appearance and use more than 1,200 fighting techniques in several modes, including Normal, Deathmatch, Gruesome, and Battle Royal. The game also includes a practice dojo in which you can practice your standing move, grab move, running move, and your move against a downed opponent.
